content: I'm here to support you. Please share what's troubling you so we can work through it together.
I'm here and ready to assist you! How can I help you today?
Who was the first president of the United States?
The first president of the United States was George Washington. How can I assist you further today?
Who was the first president of France?
The first President of France was Louis-Napoléon Bonaparte, who later became Emperor Napoleon III. How can I help you next?
